definitions: (of a person, organism, etc.) affected with a disease-causing organism

examples.text: rabies results from a bite by an infected dog

shortDefinitions: (of person, organism, etc.) affected with disease-causing organism

definitions: (of air, water, etc.) contaminated with harmful organisms

examples.text: the bacteria can get into a crop from an infected water supply

shortDefinitions: (of air, etc.) contaminated with harmful organisms

examples.text: malicious code designed to steal information from infected computers
